Reviews.Content: I love this camera and it's size. Perfect for my work pics and Wi-Fi capabilities. Amazone does good on all the items I have purchased so far and always hope it stays that way.

Reviews.Title: Modern technology, extensive features at a good price
Reviews.Author: Ancient Mariner "Proud Republican"
Reviews.Content: After fifty years of serious photography, the features provided by this tiny camera are astonishing.Canon cameras have been and continue to be, close to the best investments available.Typical superb Canon packaging and rapid Amazon delivery.

Reviews.Title: Love it and the guy who stole it loves it too... I guess
Reviews.Author: M. Siewierska
Reviews.Content: My old Canon died a few weeks ago. I wasn't really sure which camera to buy but Amazon is usually the first place I start to look for things. So I ordered this camera and the delivery was on time but the camera was missing from the box. Instead, there was an old silver Canon PowerShot Elph 1000IS 7.1 MP inside ( about 6 year- old model ?) Apparently somebody switched it for a new one and I was the unlucky customer.  I had Amazon contact me promptly and Andrea from customer service kindly ordered the replacement for me. The new camera has just been delivered and I love it.  Thank you, Andrea and I hope Amazon will be able to the bottom of this. I love Amazon but next time I'm buying electronics I'm going to a physical store.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: jose sut
Reviews.Content: work perfectly. Take nice picture. i always carrie with me. The video looks nice too. is hd 720. i rocomende to every body.

Reviews.Title: I haven't fully conquered it yet but so far so good
Reviews.Author: roundgal
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my old Kodak digital was eating batteries and couldn't do the close ups I need for online selling.  So far, so good with this camera.  I miss a view finder and the lack of one is making the taking of pictures in the sun a bit more difficult.  But reading reviews around the web indicate this is a good choice in its price range and I'm pleased so far.  It does have the close up capabilities I need and I haven't had to recharge the batteries since the initial charge in the month or so I've had it.

Reviews.Title: great little camera w/video
Reviews.Author: Michele W.
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted.  Easy to use and perfect size. pics and video look like 1080P although not.  and so much space.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Kimmai D.
Reviews.Content: uncle bought these for our family out of the USA. works and looks great so everyone is a happy camper

Reviews.Title: This camera is a great deal
Reviews.Author: nancy chapin
Reviews.Content: The size is perfect  and easy to carry.  It takes great pictures.  I would recommend it for anyone. It is easy to operate

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for wound care pics
Reviews.Author: Beckie F.
Reviews.Content: It works great for what I chose it for and takes excellent pics close up and a bit farther away.

Reviews.Title: Interim replacement
Reviews.Author: Tanika D. Joiner
Reviews.Content: Like camera. It's okay. Bought it as a interim replacement for a Nikon Coolpix I bought and had sd card errors with. Returned Nikon and needed something inexpensive for the mean time till I can afford something better. Takes nice pics, Having a little issue with some pics being more on the yellow side. Haven't had a chance to see if there is a white balance. I do love cannons though and will probably get an upgraded canon before the year is out.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Gregory T. Labacz
Reviews.Content: I have the larger cannon eos rebel ,but, I love this one because I can just put it in my pocket . It takes great pictures and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: The LCD is not clear enough, the pictures sometimes ok, most of the time not so good. I feel Disappointed .

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Aikz "real nurse"
Reviews.Content: The flaw of this camera is that the time between you pressing the button and the shot is somewhat long. And the quality of pictures I do not like. Not the same canon I used to have before. Regret that I registered my old canon

Reviews.Title: the len shutter is not proper shut and always have a line of dust on it.
Reviews.Author: JESSICA C.
Reviews.Content: i like the camera is light, fast, functional, and  good price but the shutter of the len is not shut properly, it leaves a line of dust on it, and i have to clean it frequently

Reviews.Title: exactly how I expected
Reviews.Author: Ann Snyder
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly how I expected and is very convenient. I had a little trouble getting the wireless to work but otherwise everything is fine.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: DarthCupcake89
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift to myself after having my daughter. It takes awesome pictures and videos! The mic on the camera is great and after messing around with the settings, it is very easy to understand. I would highly recommend this camera to any novice who is wanting something great for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: WOW......
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Drougas
Reviews.Content: VERY FAST DELIVERY.....amazing!!!!! I love this camera....We ride Our horses all over the west and I've been holding out for a light weight compact camera with a zoom......This is camera has it all AND a macro setting!!!!! AND only $109.00......very happy!!!!!

Reviews.Title: wish buttons would lightup in the dark
Reviews.Author: victoria
Reviews.Content: I love it..nice upgrade from my old canon.pics are clear when in automode..the other end is like medium quality:/ ..and i wish the buttonpad would lightup in the dark

Reviews.Title: Power is right
Reviews.Author: William C Pfaff
Reviews.Content: For the money, this camera is very tough to beat.  Durable, great zoom, and good balance in your hand.  Highly recommended for the beginner to intermediate photographer.

Reviews.Title: Small but mighty!
Reviews.Author: annross
Reviews.Content: We can take pictures anywhere at any time. The quality is 4 star. We would buy this item for friends or family for special occasioins!

Reviews.Title: Very awesome camera
Reviews.Author: BlueSkyRecipe "Just a guy"
Reviews.Content: These little PowerShot cameras are phenomenal when it comes to picture quality. I've personally owned 4 of them in my lifetime, apparently they aren't very useful if you leave them in your hotel room in mexico...IMO these are the pinnacle of Compact Point-And-Shoot cameras, great for selfies, small and light weight, works well in dark and outdoors. Perfect size for capturing family moments, whether video or photos. I won't list features of this camera cause I'm sure someone else probably already has, but I will say that you won't be disappointed with this camera.I've owned Nikon DSLRs for over a decade now and this camera is my pocket cam. Yes I understand that I could just use my smartphone to do the same thing, however there is no comparison in photo quality, and you won't hog up your phones storage space.

Reviews.Title: An easy to sue camera
Reviews.Author: David Ottinger
Reviews.Content: A simple, easy to use camera that allowed me to transition from 35 mil photos. I was able to transfer the images to my computer with no trouble.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Amatuers
Reviews.Author: Mike "McMac79"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes excellent pictures.  I opened the box, played around with the buttons for about 15 minutes or so to learn about it's different functions and that was about it.  It's very small which was awkward at first however after I got used to it, I found it to be a really good feature for carrying it around.  I honestly didn't have a single bad picture on a recent family vacation.  The different sensors for red-eye, blinking, and movement work amazingly well.  Downloading and editing the photo's to our home computer was simple and fast.  My wife and I are complete amateur's who both still carry flip phones!  This camera is fun to use and it makes our photo opportunities a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Moua
Reviews.Content: An awesome camera, just awesome. However the battery doesn't last long if you're planning on shooting 20 second clips on 720p and later on put it together for a video. Takes great pictures and video!

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: judie jones
Reviews.Content: So far so good, can't hook up to wifi, but I am not great with the computer. I do it the old fashioned way with the cord. Great photos so far and i really have not read the whole booklet to try more things

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: MJ "Janie"
Reviews.Content: Takes clear pictures.  Super easy to use.  Says it's wi-fi but I haven't had time to try that function out yet.

Reviews.Title: perfect size
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: it is the perfect size camera and takes great photos.  the video is good, but could be a bit better.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected...
Reviews.Author: Kayakinggoddess
Reviews.Content: I thought the wifi connection could go directly to email accounts but once I received the camera I realize this model is somewhat limited. Just make sure and investigate everything. The camera is perfectly fine and does everything it says it will regarding taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: newnana
Reviews.Content: I replaced a similar camera and I am happy with this one but you have to be careful when shooting at an angle or too quickly as I have had some blurred shots.  Probably the operator and not the camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Piotr
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this camera and was partially concerned with some of the negative feedback.  I want to say that the camera is excellent.  This is not a $5000 camera so can't expect super fine pictures every time.  The size is obviously a great plus.  It's easy to carry in a pocket without any issues.  The display is large and nice as well.  The camera takes excellent pictures in various lighting, and allows for quick changes.  I have not tried much in the evening or very very low light, but for general use it is a great buy for many purposes.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Jason W. Overholser
Reviews.Content: Simple, easy to use. Better photos than your phone takes. Small and light. Love it. Especially for the price! Thanks.

Reviews.Title: This a little complicated for me.
Reviews.Author: Grammy Cindy
Reviews.Content: I guess I need to practice a little more taking pictures inside.  I do like the large screen for viewing my pictures, but when taking inside pictures I notice they are a little dark so I guess I'll have to try some different settings other then AUTO.

Reviews.Title: We love it
Reviews.Author: Paul Harder
Reviews.Content: Really easy to use and learn. Great quality for reasonable price point and shoot. Weight and size easy to put in pocket or small purse.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Jen Gototweski
Reviews.Content: It was small, steady, and took great shots which is all I need for vacations. It was sometimes hard to see the screen in the sun though.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Samuel B. Justus
Reviews.Content: Camera has preformed as expected. Would like to put memory card in computer and not use USB cord. Hope to find extra batteries soon.

Reviews.Title: Overall great camera.
Reviews.Author: TA
Reviews.Content: Exceeds my expectations for picture quality and video stability. Battery life is my only complaint, so bought two more batteries.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 8X Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Walter Satterthwait
Reviews.Content: Fine camera.  I haven't had it long enough, or used it enough, to know how much I like it in the long term, but so far it's doing well.  Decent batter life, decent picture quality.  I'm not a good enough photographer to worry too much about anything else.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot ELPH 130 Digital Camera with Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Jairo Fonseca Mendez "Tonny"
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating of the product for  the price, size and comfort when using it. The product is better than a similar product (Olympus) that I used for two years. The product met my my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Felicia E.
Reviews.Content: Great camera for novice. Everything I wanted and meets description. Have only used it a couple of times but so far so good

Reviews.Title: Great camera and Great Price
Reviews.Author: A. Barrett
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It picks up every tiny speck of anything in the picture.  The price was a great plus.

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased
Reviews.Author: Heidi P. Guilfoyle "hgilly"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera - it's lite to carry, small enough to put in a pocket or purse, and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good Product.
Reviews.Author: Gene M Phipps
Reviews.Content: Not a photography experts so keep that in mind.The camera feels solid and well made.  The memory card and battery are easy to put in and take out.  Compact size and light weight.  Inexpensive enough that you don't mind taking it on vacation or to the beach.  I am more then happy with the picture and video quality.  I bought two extra batteries and a 32gb memory card and the three batteries (one comes with the camera)  were enough for 2 weeks in China taking lots of pictures and videos at two weddings.  I used about 12gb of the card.  Was nice to just take the extra batteries as they are very small and light and leave the charger at home.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Carrol
Reviews.Content: CAME FAST VERY EASY TO USE BEAUTIFUL PICTURES I KEEP IT IN MY PURSE ALL DAY JUST A GREAT BUY, SO PLEASED WITH IT.. VERY HAPPY!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: munchie
Reviews.Content: For the price it's a good camera & is what I wanted.  The picture quality is good & I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Debra Ginder
Reviews.Content: Pictures are really clear on this camera and it is very easy to use.  It is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: hans hofman "hans"
Reviews.Content: I photographed children, landscapes and oher stuff and they all look pretty similar to what I remembered. Easy to use. And very red.

Reviews.Title: new camera for my beatiful wife
Reviews.Author: bruce267
Reviews.Content: i have always been happy with canon products. this camera is perfect. has many updates that we didnt have in the camera it replaced. very clear pics at a good price

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Fox
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos and is very easy to use.  I use it for closeups and it's fantastic.  It's also very reasonable in price.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot digital camera
Reviews.Author: mags
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!! The design and quality of pictures are amazing! Small and compact so you can carry it with you so when that perfect shot comes along, you are ready!

Reviews.Title: Camera purchase.
Reviews.Author: Connie Addison
Reviews.Content: Found this online at a good price.  We received the camera quickly and it was what we expected.  It was a positive buying experience.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powerball
Reviews.Author: Bootsie
Reviews.Content: I love it , so light and easy to use! The pictures turned out beautiful. Will be using this item quite a bit.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: RPH
Reviews.Content: My sister-in-law has this camera and after I used hers I knew I needed to trade in my old Nikon for one like this. It takes great pictures...great color, short recycle time for the battery, and small enough to fit in my pocket. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Buttons a little small.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan "fan_blades"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cheap camera, mostly to take pictures of things to sell on eBay, but to also take with me outdoors, hiking, etc. every once in a while.  It looks to be exactly as advertised.Like other reviews have said, it's a little annoying to have to charge the battery separately.  And the button wheel is extremely tiny, even for my medium sized hands/fingers.I don't expect this to be a life long product.  The real test is to see how long it lasts before I will have to buy a replacement to see if I got my money's worth.

Reviews.Title: as expected
Reviews.Author: Kushan Mehta
Reviews.Content: only one complain:- lag time for taking picture is more..quality of ppics are good..nice experiece.suggest to buy

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Abby1788
Reviews.Content: I know absolutely nothing about cameras. I did know I would need a new one to take photos of my new baby, so I came on Amazon and checked out reviews.This camera takes great quality photos from what I can tell so far. The battery is rechargeable which is very handy. I received this camera on 2/11 and today is 2/26. I haven't had to recharge the battery yet so I'd say it has good battery life.

Reviews.Title: EZ to Use - Recommend
Reviews.Author: Jay J Melquist "Jay J"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice quality small camera ... could be your primary or second camera.  The photos themselves are very clear ... nice short video option.  EZ to use and priced right so recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Rosalinda Avila "Lovecat59"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to carry with me at all times. I wanted more pixels than a  camera phone. My favorite feature is the vivid color function. Bright, colorful, vivid images every time! Make sure to take pictures at least 3-5 feet away from your subject.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera and took it on a weekend trip to San Diego. I loved the easy use of the camera and the pictures turned out great.  I did quite a bit of research on small cameras and found this one to be the best, and it has lived up to my research.  The only complaint I have is the complications of hooking it up to wifi.  I still haven't been able to figure that out, but it's not a feature that is terribly important to me.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: jmo69
Reviews.Content: Simple to use, doesn't need a lot of light and stops action quite well. Battery life is good too. Haven't downloaded the pic yet.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: carina ferrer
Reviews.Content: for the price I think its okay and its cute the color but its not professional camera very lightly I mean its not that heavy for my 7 years old daughter she likes it

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Lou Collazo
Reviews.Content: This camera was gifted to a person who was visiting the U.S. and who had not concept of photography. The cameral was delivered within the next day, which surprised the tourist, and me too. I am a professional myself and would not carry this camera. Nevertheless, the person who I gifted it to was able to understand and find all the major features without a problem. The price is right for the features and picture resolution. If you need a camera to put in your back pocket or back pack, this is an affordable and good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Thought Wifi Sharing was easier
Reviews.Author: Isildur
Reviews.Content: To enable dropbox, youtube, facebook and other sharing services over Wifi,  you must install a software in you computer an then enable it on the camera.  The next version let's you do this directly from the camera.  And it's only 40 bucks more.

Reviews.Title: still researching
Reviews.Author: Rakesh
Reviews.Content: Camera is good but not the software ,trying to figure out  how wifi works on this camera ,software works fine if you are connected using usb cable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: David Freeman
Reviews.Content: This camera has been terrific.  It is easy to use and the picture quality is exceptional.  I was lucky to get this camera on sale but it would still be an excellent value at its regular price.

Reviews.Title: great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: bane
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my old canon elph which lasted me many years.  It's just as easy to use and is better than my original.  More pixels, larger display, closer zoom.  It takes great pictures for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: 1984 Great Dane
Reviews.Content: Never disappointed us.  We had our iPhone for pictures too, but the quality of picture with this camera was consistently perfect.  Never a graining or out of focus picture.  With the zoom, we could get much closer also.  A lot of camera in a very small size.  One of my best buys this year.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DJones
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures for a small point and shoot.  This is a great camera for teenagers. Nice looking and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: rod
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera and paid less than I would if I bought it at a BestBuy or and other store

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Bowman
Reviews.Content: The quality of photos this camera produces are second to none. I have received several compliments on snapshots I have taken and truly enjoy using this camera. Recommended to anyone who wants excellent pictures without a huge price tag!

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: colt45
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price! lots of features , lite weight. I have looked for the right camera for awhile and I didn't want to spend a lot of money. It was a Christmas gift to myself.

Reviews.Title: Perfect transaction
Reviews.Author: cher
Reviews.Content: Great price, fast shipping. The camera is easy to use and take great pics. My daughter loves it, it goes with her everywhere!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Top Flite Golfer "Top Flite Golfer"
Reviews.Content: Good product but my wife had some issues with reviewing previous pix, initially.  Once she got used to it, all went well.  There's not a whole lot of difference between these kinds of cameras.  Hasn't been used much yet but Canon is quality equipment and we're sure that this camera will fulfill our needs.  We think the product comes at a good price too.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Meredith Samson
Reviews.Content: My husband had an old Canon that needed updating.  We have a nice DSL but like to take a small no frills with us when we hike and explore.  This camera takes great pictures and is small and easy to pack along.  I got an extra battery so one is always charged.  A small case with room enough room for a couple of SD cards and you're good to go!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful point and shoot for home users
Reviews.Author: Zee
Reviews.Content: I previously owned a Nikon coolpix and this camera is far more superior to that camera in every way. Pictures are clear even without the flash.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mildred Busch
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my daughter-in law, she loves it and very pleased with all the functions and great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Light and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: DON B
Reviews.Content: Simple and fits into a pocket.  Point and shoot with no disappointment.  Not necessarily for the artsy - most useful for portrait use.

Reviews.Title: Great size better quality
Reviews.Author: DJF_online shopper
Reviews.Content: Happy with out selection…this camera fits in any pocket or purse. Easy to use and the quality is excellentIts a keeper

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: great little camera for my wife, she loves how easy it really is. would but another at any time. great

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: Walter "Walter"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the speed, picture quality and over all performance of this camera.No it doesn't have all the features like WIFI, but for the price it meets my expectations.

Reviews.Title: A gift.
Reviews.Author: Lizzy
Reviews.Content: The recipient has had nothing but great things to say about this camera.  It was what she wanted and has enjoyed using it - it takes excellent and clear, sharp pictures.

Reviews.Title: Beware!! Software does not load properly and establishing wifi is impossible!!
Reviews.Author: K. Romano "Krazy K"
Reviews.Content: Had a canon powershot before and loved it!  Was excited to see one that had a wifi connection that I could possibly download pics straight to facebook to share with family and friends.  Despite installing and uninstalling the software, I cannot get Canon's Image X to load (it gets hung at 80%) and I cannot get the camera to establish a connection to my computer using wifi.  I have spent the last two days trying to research fixes for these issues and am finding there are no fixes that work.  I am frustrated that I have spent this long trying to fix program problems on something that should be as simple as loading a disk and letting the software do what it should.  I like to think that I am fairly computer savy but even I cannot fix these issues!!  The camera itself is great and takes good pics and video, just don't expect to use the canon software or the wifi!!

Reviews.Title: So far it seems to work fine.
Reviews.Author: Ivar
Reviews.Content: This is the third camera from this series that I have owned. The first lasted for years and years.The second failed when the glass window cracked on the back. other vise it kept working. That is what happens when you carry it in your pants pocket.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: barrett l. knight
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes very nice pictures. It is better at the action pics then our old camera. It is small but comfortable in your hand.

Reviews.Title: Small Package Great Power
Reviews.Author: Godfrey J Pinto
Reviews.Content: Once again Cannon has designed an easy-to-use point and shoot camera that is convenient to carry around and takes great snapshots.

Reviews.Title: "Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera w/8x Optical Zoom."
Reviews.Author: Ronald Yamamoto
Reviews.Content: "The family member who received this camera reported being overjoyed with this wonderful Canon PowerShot camera, from it's ease of use, excellent photo results under any number of lighting situations, both indoors and out, true color reproduction and clarity of photos.  Bottomline: Canon makes excellent cameras; this superbly made digital model was well priced, easy to use, with wonderful photographic results.  Enjoy!"

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Artison
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a camera which was small enough to take and place in one's pocket. This camera takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Ora M Golden
Reviews.Content: So far I love it but I have not had it very long. It is exactly what I wanted in size, fits in my pocket neatly, takes great pictures with great ease.  For me it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 130
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: Have bought Sony, Nikon and other brands. For some reason never a Canon. When I looked at the specs the Canon was the best for the money. Great wide angle, nice size and fantastic zoom plus wi-fi

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Joseph D. Shea
Reviews.Content: A complete camera package, ideal for daily, casual use.Easy to use, convenient to carry and attractive.I love it!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: very good your product with specifications agree to put in your ad served me as a gift I am already recommending your store to buy products

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and love the long battery life over old camera with AA batteries. May buy another similar model.

Reviews.Title: Camera takes very good pictures
Reviews.Author: Ralph Bayard
Reviews.Content: Camera performs very well.  We get good, bright pictures.  Only problem so far is that the WIFI is not compatible with my Vista operating system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Pilar, Uruguay
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it have a very good zoom, and is very little, I can take it every where.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: bordern
Reviews.Content: Great camera and very easy to use.  Video button makes taking videos very simple. Good zoom feature.  Nice compact size.

Reviews.Title: Bought it as a gift
Reviews.Author: Carole Jean Reese "Cluete"
Reviews.Content: This was bought as a gift for my husband and he just loves it.  The view finder is large, the photo's are great, and the ease of use makes it wonderful for putting things on E-bay, taking photo's of the Grandkids, pets or anything else he wants.  This camera was much, much, more in the local stores,  and it was a great price, with delivery on Amazon.If your considering this camera,  go ahead and purchase it ,  You won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Reliable camera, good price, small size
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I have an older model PowerShot which has been great for the last 8 years, which I bought for its compact size and have been very happy with it.  I bought another Canon because of this, and for the fact that it is even smaller now with more zoom and features.  Wished that the battery and battery pack would have been interchangeable with the older model, but they are not.  Great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Ok for Personal Use
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Sloan
Reviews.Content: This camera is just OK.  For the money it works fine, but it does not take good pictures inside.  Haven't used the zoom yet, but it does take better pictures outside.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Bargren
Reviews.Content: Just started using it, but pictures are turning out great, Very easy to use, and seems to be very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: skull
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for a Christmas present for my wife. She loves it.The camera meets and excides our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great For Every day Use
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: - Straightforward to use (Just Point and Shoot)- Competitively priced against other cameras in its category- Lighting and picture quality is decent- Video recording stays at a consistent frame rate- software complements device very well*Just a quick note * If you are on OSX , and below Snow Leopard you will not be able to use the software with this camera .I actually had to upgrade my OS to be able use the Canon software.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Slim
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my cousin and she is very happy with itit was her first camera and she likes that it is simple to usethe ad said if i bought the camera i would get a free case but never got the casethats the reason for the stars

Reviews.Title: Canon does it again with another great camera.  What a great deal!
Reviews.Author: Godfather
Reviews.Content: This is my third or fourth purchase of a canon  digital camera.  The last one "broke" because it was taken to a beach.  And I loved that one.  You can imagine that you don't want to drop a camera in the sand or place it in the bag with the sandy towels?  This camera was cheaper than my last one and seems to work better!!!  I was amazed at how fast it took a picture and stored it.  Amazing technology in a tiny camera.  A great point and shoot and sometimes I prefer an actual camera over a smart phone, since you will have more control over what you are taking a picture of and the many settings for customization if you need it.  Also....your smart phone is not great for the beach....you drop the smartphone you just lost $600 bucks, you drop a $100 point and shoot....much better way to take pictures at the beach....except for the sand that got stuck in my last lens....oh well....

Reviews.Title: Great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Pearl
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my Canon ELPH130.  The pictures are so clear and sharp and the zoom pictures stay clear also.  It is easy to learn to use the basic things necessary to instantly begin using.  I have "accidentally" learned how to do some other features just by trying a few things or have them appear by something I did and not realizing it. I have not yet used any methods for printing or downloading to my computer.I am pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Returned, slow shutter and poor low light quality
Reviews.Author: Dominick Casalena
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a christmas gift and used it for the day taking indoor pictures.  My first observation was how slow it was to take a picture after pressing the button.  I kept missing the shot I wanted because it took nearly a second to actually snap the picture after pressing the button.  Even after the half press to get the focus first, the full press took a long time to actually snap the shot.  Not only does this cause a frequent loss of the picture you want, but also leads to a lot of blurry photos because it's hard to hold perfectly still while waiting for the picture to snap a full second after pressing the button.Later in the day, I used the camera on a tripod to take the traditional full family picture I always take at holidays.  The room was fairly well lit but not bright, and the camera was about 10 feet from the front row of people.  I used the timer and auto flash, which did go off.  Later when I downloaded the picture it was very grainy and orange as if the flash didn't quite reach the target.  My old powershot SD500 always got this shot perfect, but I dropped it around thanksgiving, and even though it still works perfectly, the case is bent and seams are a bit wider than they were before.  That's why I got a new one for Christmas.In the end I returned the camera, and have another cannon on the way.  Cannon makes great cameras, but this one fell short of my expectations.  It seems like as these cameras become more feature laden, the shutter lag increases.

Reviews.Title: POCKET PURRRRFECT!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Sorweide
Reviews.Content: I took this camera to the high mountains, riding horseback over 50 miles in snow and rainy weather....the lens kept clear and even in pouring rain the pictures turned out great!

Reviews.Title: Was what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Richard Keleher
Reviews.Content: The controls for the different modes are not intuitive, especially the icons for them. Otherwise, Just fine. Ran out of battery pretty quickly, until I put it on Eco mode. Now it's fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: John C. Balch
Reviews.Content: Light, easy to use, takes GREAT pictures. What else does a person need in a camera? Can't go wrong with this.  Sorry for not giving a more tech-detailed review, but I'm a photog, not a camera weenie.

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Esther T
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly.  I  take both still pictures and movies of my  grandchildren.  It is so easy to switch from  one to the other.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: The Canon PowerShot does everything I want it to do! We took it on vacation and had mypictures developed right away, they came out beautiful!! I am so satisfied with the camera!

Reviews.Title: Fits in your purse
Reviews.Author: Cheryl D. Jones "Babygirlcwj"
Reviews.Content: Or pocket.  Love this camera and it takes great pictures.  I am learning to use all the functions as it is a step by step process.  Will be going to Disney World with the grandkids and kids and know I will be enjoying this camera a lot.  This camera also fits in a pocket of your jeans, fits in your hand. Use your imagination as to where it will fit for easy carrying.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: geek12
Reviews.Content: Perfect for hiking and site-seeing. I never took pictures because I never had the patience to set up great shots (too "in the moment" to use anything but a point and shoot). Now, I take shots everywhere and I love the high quality of the photos. I have not set up the WiFi feature, but I look forward to it.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: eak
Reviews.Content: Got an older version of this two years ago as a birthday present and eventually lost it. Since I had to buy a replacement I upgraded a bit, but stuck with the same general canon powershot. Love love love this camera.I don't use it for anything too fancy (documenting vacations, minimal editing, occasionally blown up for larger prints), so its small size and crisp photos are perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Ma Zoan
Reviews.Content: So fat this camera has taken excellent pictures. I really like it because of its compact size and light weight. It fits easily into my coat pocket.

Reviews.Title: New Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Griselda
Reviews.Content: I am more than pleased with my new camera. Its easy to use and the pictures are of great quality. I highly recommend this camera! I'm super happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: Schultzfam6
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 18-year-old daughter and she loves it!  It's simple to use and takes clear pictures.  A great camera for someone who doesn't want a lot of bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Dexter Samm
Reviews.Content: Very good camera with good pics. I have not tried out the wifi yet but the camera takes good pics close up and at high speed. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: VTS
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a Canon sd1400 which died after the only fall it has ever had. This was cheaper than newest ELPH so I went with it.  My main goal was to have a camera that worked in low light for the times that I went out and carried a small clutch as my DSLR is not that portable. It works great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Erickson
Reviews.Content: I am taking some really good pictures with this.  I think the only problem I have is that the life of the battery before I have to recharge it is kind of short.  I just make sure I always have a second fully charged battery with me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: John R. Nasi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for an european vacation and was not disappointed.  It is very easy to use, has automatic settings that produce vivid pictures and the zoom capabilities are nothing short of amazing.  Lightweight and long lasting battery life.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: compact size, fair price, able to link to canon printers, still new and learning about all of the features. takes good pictures with easy to use zoomtakes good movies also

Reviews.Title: Nice Size, the Canon PowerShot Elph 130IS
Reviews.Author: Darlene Jantz
Reviews.Content: Quality great. Size is very good to carry in purse.Very neat camera. Very easy to use. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the great quality of pictures it produces and the fun effects it can produce (color accent, fish eye lens view, etc.).  I am by no means a professional photographer, and I've only used the camera once so far at a wedding, but I got so many compliments on all my photos.  The wifi is a great feature as well.  However, I can only get it to connect to my iPhone, and not my home wifi network.  Overall, great quality photos for the price.  I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom...
Reviews.Author: Ken Webmaster About Facts Net
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The photos are good, and the camera is small and handy and easily fits into a shirt pocket. If you want better photos then I suggest the Canon A series.KenWebmasterAbout Facts Net

Reviews.Title: Are we reviewing the same camera here?
Reviews.Author: rjohns
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to purchase this camera which I did based on all of the great reviews.  I have been using the camera on my cell phone for a couple of years and wanted a good point and shoot camera for taking better detailed pictures of my cats and humming birds.  I don't need a professional studio picture but I expect clear detail if I take a picture of a non moving object or a self portrait.  I have taken approximately 100 pictures and recorded video.  I have used the AUTO setting, and each one of the program settings to see if I could get one clear shot that is as good as my cell phone camera.  I had expected it be much better than my cell phonel.  I have selected fine detail and tried every pixel option as well as every ISO setting.  I am seriously wondering if I bought the same camera that was so wonderfully reviewed.  I researched prior to purchase to ensure I was buying a decent picture only to get a camera that cant take a picture better than my very first Nokia dumb phone 13 years ago.  It is sad to think that a device designed for the sole purpose of taking a picture cant capture a single picture with half the quality of my iPhone 4 or droid incredible 1.  I am going to attempt to get a replacement.  Maybe the one I received is defective and a replacement will be as great as all of these reviews indicate.

Reviews.Title: Amazing image stabilization
Reviews.Author: C. Fernandez "Carlos"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my vacation. I won't write a complete review, but I haven't used half its features. But let me tell you this - I took some pictures on a very windy day at Point Lobos (so windy it took some effort to walk) and there's no blur whatsoever. I'm impressed by the job the stabilizer does.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Camera works as advertised. WiFi photo share is very handy for sharing single pics. Battery life is good. Pic quality is above average for point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Don't like the picture quality
Reviews.Author: Cletustu
Reviews.Content: Not that sharp and the colors don't seem accurate.  I am a photo enthusiast with a Nikon d600 and lots of good lenses.  I wanted an easy point and shoot option to carry around.  I know point and shoot will never be as good as a DSLR, but my phone takes better pictures than this...  For $200, I would expect more.

Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: Steven Craigen "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with this camera. So far it has worked as it was intended to! I'd buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: LoveMy JEEP
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pictures, and does just about everything for you.  All you have to do is point and click.  It autofocuses for you and warns you if there isn't enough light, and so many other cool features.  It is about the same size as a cell phone, so a little hard to hold, which is why I only gave it 4 stars. It takes a little getting used to. And, maybe it is just me, but if a camera needs a special type of battery, or needs a SD card, then it should come with it. Yes, you need to buy a SD card.  A case would be nice too.  Cannon needs to make a protective case. It does come with a wrist strap, which I recommend using until you get used to handling the camera, to avoid droppage..

Reviews.Title: Fun camera
Reviews.Author: Andi C Bair
Reviews.Content: The Canon ELPH series constitutes light-weight, fun cameras, available in many colors, and focused on convenience. Let me use my usual disclaimer, in the interest of fairness, and admit that many cameras by reputable makers (and there are many) deliver what they promise. It is more about what camera traits you are looking for. So, I would suggest to anyone looking to buy one to google 'camera trait search' and get the whole picture.The ELPH130 is a fixed lens camera (point and shoot, some would say), with 16 resolution (megapixels), and a x8 zoom. The sensor size is 1/2.3 inch CCD-type, which is standard for cameras of its class.It does not have a viewfinder, which, again, many in its class don't. The ISO rating, which is the gauge for how well it does in low light, is 6400, up from 1600 for the ELPH 115. The video is a Full HD- that is 1980x1080 resolution. It does not have a hot shoe for an external flash option. That is not unexpected for its size and category. The LCD screen is a 461,000 resolution, up from 230,000 for the ELPH 115. The camera does not do RAW processing but you would need only if you did not want to be limited by JPEG type storage. The burst rate is a reasonable 2.9 frames persecond- great for quick shots. The weight of the camera is a convenient 145 grams.Overall, nice, fun camera. Having been into photography for a while, I do stress though that you do a camera trait search. That will also tell you more about what you want.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality of Pictures
Reviews.Author: John King
Reviews.Content: Thought with the name "Canon" the end result would be a superb picture. Far from good quality. Bought a Kodak 12 years ago with less megapixiels, but what a better result. Probably going to return the Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Liza
Reviews.Content: The quality of this camera is great, and love the zoom! The only thing is that there is a few seconds lag time between taking pictures, as I read in other reviews, but otherwise a great camera overall for my needs, which is just taking pictures with friends and family, nothing too fancy.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Smulders "Mom and Grammy"
Reviews.Content: Great price.  The photos are sharp and beautiful.  The video function also has great clarity.  This small, affordable camera is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a gift to send to a soldier that had deployed. I wanted something small enough so they could carry it anywhere they wanted/needed to but with good quality. This is the best that I found and is at a competitive price!

Reviews.Title: Just as expected
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: The camera is just as it shows, takes great pictures even without flash.The shipping was quick. Wouldn't choose any other.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Ellie
Reviews.Content: Love my Elph 130 IS Camera. Takes great pictures. I bought it for myself as a Christmas gift to replace an older Nikon that I had. Fits into my handbag easily. Looking forward to taking more great pictures when I go to Europe in the spring.Ellie

Reviews.Title: Excellent simple use camera
Reviews.Author: ajit thakkar
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to replace the canon I lost. Its a simple camera with excellent results.Takes excellent short movie clips. Great camera for general use without complications.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift Winner
Reviews.Author: Bette R.
Reviews.Content: This camera was for my 11-yr. old granddaughter for Christmas.  It is her first camera and while it has many fantastic features on it, she was able to understand and use many of the features.  She was thrilled!

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Jennie750608
Reviews.Content: I received the camera in the mail yesterday, as promised. Arrived in perfect condition. I was so excited to receive the camera. I had an older model of the camera but my ex lost it nearly 3 and a half years ago. I had the PowerShot SD600. I loved the functions it had. When I saw this updated version, I quickly decided that I wanted a similar camera to the one I owned many years ago. This camera has more functions and capabilities than the older model. I love the WiFi option. But I still love the Color Accent feature....it was my favorite back then, and it still is my favorite. I'm going to have a blast re-discovering my new camera. Yay!

Reviews.Title: Nothing distinguishable in actual photo performance
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: Lots of nice bells and whistles. But a digital point and shoot is still just that, have wait what seems like an eternity after i push the button before it actaully takes the photo. Special lighting conditions really confound it.

Reviews.Title: Overall - not very user friendly
Reviews.Author: JANET GAGNON
Reviews.Content: Camera is smaller than i expected, takes ok pictures but not very user friendly.  I expected more wifi functionality. For the price, should have included a case of some sort...even a felt one is better than none.  Battery does as long as i had hoped.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I tried it but it wasnt put to the ultimate testing. I does find that when you are trying to focus the image looks a bit grainy. Will update as i go alone.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Prescott "MilDoc"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for LOML since she hates using my much more complicated one. Nice auto mode, works pretty well. I tested it by taking 100 pics and a few videos myself. and the pics are good as usual for Canon. Have had no problems.

Reviews.Title: The Canon PowerShot digital camera 130 IS requires a techie to owe it. Be carefuul.
Reviews.Author: Timothy Lassiter "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Too many negative issues to make note of. BUT I returned this camera due to the inability to use the wi fi functions, the main reason I purchased this particular camera. Many, many hours online with the Canon techs and they couldn't even get the software to load properly which is necessary in order to use the wi fi functions. I quickly realized the tiny, tiny buttons on the back was totally a pain in the butt. Surely Canon can do better. The problems with the camera are all software related including printing photos and sending emails. Impossible for me a t least. I also discovered it is absolutely necessary to download a few other software programs from web sites to use this camera. As I said many hours wasted. Beautiful pictures, pocket sized, bright flash, etc.  were the best part of owning this camera. I listen to too many reviews and misjudged those reviews when others were complaining about the same issues I ran into. I should have been more attuned to those critical reviews. Definitely would not buy this product again or for that matter any Conon PowerShot cameras.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Katherine Hammontré
Reviews.Content: You can't get a better photo for the price.  I love mine and the size is perfect - it takes great zoomed in photos.  Nothing bad to say about it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful toy
Reviews.Author: Yuri "Yuri"
Reviews.Content: After I figured out with the help of community how to do the most difficult task of threading the strap, I have been using the camera for two weeks now on my trip across Florida panhandle. I did not have the time to read the manual but the camera is a simple joy to use. I already produced 200 great pictorial testimonies, some shot on a spur of the moment, the not-so-easy to catch birds, or passing boats. I particularly love the easy zooming. It does require a bit of manual dexterity - a minor and interesting challenge. Make sure you hold it steady for a few seconds and you will be rewarded with easy-to-shoot high quality photos. The camera in addition to being very easy to use, has a great feel and snappy look. Transferring pictures is also so easy, with any browser, and on any PC. As a reminder, one does need to buy a memory stick with it. The 16 GB will serve you plenty.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bing Shi
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my brother. They used it and love it. No problems. The images look great. I like it

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth McNally
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an easy compact camera for my wife and this one met all of our expectations. It takes a really clear picture and most of the features are automatic. I would recommend this for anyone who likes to fit a camera in a pocket or purse that takes pictures on the fly. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!  Super photos.
Reviews.Author: Marilyn G. Smith
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  I carry it with me all the time - it fits beautifully in my purse!  Super price.

Reviews.Title: Eh
Reviews.Author: Hbmommy5
Reviews.Content: The quilts isn't so great and sometimes the wifi doesn't connect. I called the customer service once to try to have them help me figure out how to connect it back to my iPhone and they were really rude. Maybe it was just that one just, but his customer service skills suck. Anyways the camera was only like 110 or something so I guess I can't complain. I wish I would have put out the extra money for something a lil nicer.

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH 130 Camera
Reviews.Author: M. D. Bruneau "RAGMAN"
Reviews.Content: This is a very simple devise to operate and I would recommend it as a take along camera, takes very good pictures and canon gives good support.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Julie de Monbrun
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I big DSLR and I wanted something small that I could carry in my pocket or purse. It takes pictures great and does give a vivid color but  I like it!! Fun and easy to use! Worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures on Rafting Trips
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I like to go with the quick and handy approach to taking pictures on raft trips.  I have had huge thanks and compliments from the quality of pictures this camera takes and when the photo moment arises, I am able to quickly pull out the camera and capture many moments that are missed with larger cameras packed away.  Make sure to learn how to use the different settings for "snow" days, low light, water shots, etc.  Also highly recommend getting the "Square Trade" warranty.  I have used it twice with very high satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: my canon powershot
Reviews.Author: Conniep
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera itself. The shipping was on time and the service polite. I definitely would buy this type of camera again and I also would buy from this seller again.What I did not like was the fact that one day after receiving the camera the same camera was advertised at amazon.com for $ 10 less. I decided to do more shopping next time before I buy.

Reviews.Title: overall good deal
Reviews.Author: Y-Not "John"
Reviews.Content: 8x Zoom is nice to have at this price point.  I've had good luck with this series of Canon Cameras previously.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed with picture quality
Reviews.Author: Chandima Rajakaruna
Reviews.Content: I bought this about 7 months ago and am really disappointed with the picture quality. I can understand poor quality in low light, but I end up being disappointed with about 50% of the shots I take in bright daylight. I have had good Canon cameras in the past but was really disappointed with the picture quality of this one. Not sure if I just got a defective camera but I am actively looking for another camera now.

Reviews.Title: Just a clicking
Reviews.Author: anne
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I am only having problems with the movie part but I am sure after awhile I will also teach myself to do that too. I don't think the book explanes things simple enough for me to understand. But Love the camera. Price is right

Reviews.Title: Nice digital pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Pepper
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera as a beginning transition from film to digital. So far, I'm not getting very sharp photos, even though I use a tripod and the focusing options to center my subject. I don't find the instructions easy to follow.  I work with it several days a week and look at my photos. I'm an experienced photographer in film and multi-format cameras, including medical and field photography. But for various reasons I won't go into, I'm late moving into the digital photo world.I chose this camera because it has all the properties recommended for my purpose, including movie-making, to learn digital photography. I have other instructional materials that I hope will help me move forward more quickly. Then I'll come back and update my review.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect size for a young woman to carry around and very easy to use.  I bought it for her for Christmas to take on her honeymoon.  Can't wait to see her pictures.  She loved it.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth C. Brewer "scifinerd"
Reviews.Content: easy to use and compact. I haven't tried the wireless yet, but from others' reviews it seems that it will be very convenient. I like to just plug the thing in.

Reviews.Title: Wifi weird
Reviews.Author: William Marlowe
Reviews.Content: I was hoping for a push here dummy type of wifi but set up uses mac addresses.  Otherwise the camera is nice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Gary Houk
Reviews.Content: Super Pricing!Great Features!Terrific Pictures!I would highly recommend, Brand Name with the price at an unbelievable price and loaded.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Hal
Reviews.Content: High quality photos, good video, and WiFi. What more can you ask of a pocket camera? I am replacing a Canon SD1100 and this is even better!

Reviews.Title: I Should Have Listened to Other Reviewers
Reviews.Author: barbwire
Reviews.Content: The camera is ok.  I have taken a lot of pix for at least 15 years with point and shoot cameras, 3 different cameras.  The Canon received good ratings but there were comments about the battery and replacement batteries.  I should have listened to several other reviewers.1) I don't like a camera that can only charge the battery by taking it out and using a power outlet.  I have been spoiled by charging my camera on my computer with the USB.2) I needed a tweezer to get the original battery out to charge it.3) I ordered a second battery to always have one at the ready.  I chose a non-Canon vendor with the correct number on it NB-11L.  When received, the battery was slightly longer and thicker.  After trying a few times to insert it, I decided to return the battery so that I wouldn't damage the camera.I have only had the camera for a short time so I may not keep it either because of the above comments

Reviews.Title: USER FRIENDLY
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: I NEEDED A BASIC DIGITAL CAMERA THAT WAS IDIOT PROOF AND THIS IS IT. IT IS SMALL AND COMPACT ENOUGH TO CARRY IN MY PURSE. TAKES GREAT PICTURES AND HAS A RECHARGEABLE BATTERY. NO ONE HAVING TO BUY THEM. ONCE YOU FIGURE IT OUT IT IS EASY TO UPLOAD YOUR PICTURES

Reviews.Title: Quality Itiem
Reviews.Author: Paul Morneau
Reviews.Content: I use this camera all the time and it works beautiful. The screen that displays the picture works perfectly and I would highly recommend this camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: B. Hoffmann "mom of 3"
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera is fine. We didn't need a fancy camera with all the bells and whistles. This camera is easy to use but the time between pictures is a little long. Action pictures are blurry so that is disappointing because what child wants to be completely still? For now it works for us but I think in the future we will want a better camera.

Reviews.Title: camera elph 130
Reviews.Author: kima
Reviews.Content: The camera feels...really light, but its not a good  light, like its a plastic toy camera. other than that I tried shooting a couple times and the quality is great, just like it said.

Reviews.Title: Not up to Canon Standards
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: This little camera, I suppose, would be OK if all you were shooting were stationery objects at near range. But who does that?The shutter is so slow to fire objects about to move are in the next county before the shutter releases.It has a zoom but the quality of the photo using it is horrendous.I regret having purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera and easy to use/understand.  Takes great pics, too!!!Have had many positive comments.  Can't beat a Canon.

Reviews.Title: very nice Camera for using in home
Reviews.Author: irakli uchadze
Reviews.Content: I bouy it form my cusen, he is very sutiffueddon await from camera same magic fotos , it is camera form family foto and nothing more

Reviews.Title: My granddaughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: careful shopper
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas.  I have not had any hands on experience with the camera but I gave it 5 stars because she has enjoyed it so much.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Murray
Reviews.Content: Received in a very timely manner.  Christmas gift, so no knowledge of how my granddaughter will like it.  She chose it, so probably will enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: lea
Reviews.Content: Super good ittem and fast delivered thank u i buy for my little daughter (and orderd one more for my older one she is sooooooo happy

Reviews.Title: Mediocre camera
Reviews.Author: Bianca
Reviews.Content: The camera works great for basic shots. At night and in bright light the shots aren't that great. It's super easy to use on automatic and manual. I wish I had saved my money and bought a better canon camera, but I was very impatient. It does focus really well. It is probably the best digital camera I have owned, but it's really not exactly what I was looking for. Plus, the bottom half of the lens is sticking and won't close, which is really upsetting.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Dr. Leigh E. Tenkku "bookaholic"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. Love the color. Very easy to use and very lightweight so easy to carry around! Buy it!

Reviews.Title: love camera not software
Reviews.Author: J. Sallee
Reviews.Content: This software isn't as user friendly as my last camera, which was a little harder to work with than the one before that. Quit making it a process to download. Also, none of my cards fit , it wasn't SD format. Pictures are very good, clear, crisp. Auto feature is good. Why are all the cameras made with the on/off next to the take pic button. I turn the thing off half the time I'm trying to take a picture. Big foot is safe around me!

Reviews.Title: Will not connect to iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Ann M Johnson
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for a trip and its ability to connect to the iPad.  Evidently the new iPad update does not allow the app to work.  So what is the purpose of buying a camera with WiFi capability if the pictures won't transfer?  It is going to be returned.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard Ago
Reviews.Content: Price is good, pictures are nice.  Not as fast at taking pictures as my DSLR but ..... it is not a DSLR.  I like this for going out to events so that I do not have to lug around a bag or wear my camera around my neck all night and worry about putting it down.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera two days but I love it and the size. Easy to set up and to use. Directions are simple enough for even me. This camera is replacing a $350.00 Kodak that was bulking to carry and the batteries were constantly going dead.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0
Reviews.Author: mofran
Reviews.Content: I like the efficient way it came, but there was no memory card so I just had to order one for $16 from a camera shop. So the price was not really true because who can use a nice camera without a card? Maybe I can post a nicer comment when I can use it. :)Any thoughts?

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershop ELPH
Reviews.Author: Joan L. Lovejoy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for travel and am looking forward to using it a lot.  I too my big camera to Europe last year and found it was too cumbersome taking it in and out of backpack.........

Reviews.Title: A dissapointment
Reviews.Author: P. Lauriello "pjl"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and bought the camera. I don't know what these people are doing that I am not but this is the most difficult menu I ever had to figure out. This camera is NOT user friendly and mine will not even take pictures with a flash mode on. This is the worst camera I ever owned. I called the Cannon company customer service and he couldn't figure it out either. This camera is awful and that's the best I can say for it. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: NOT A VERY GOOD CAMERA IF YOU REALLY CARE ABOUT YOUR PICTURES
Reviews.Author: Mikec
Reviews.Content: I RESORT TO USING IT JUST TO TAKE PICS FOR MY EBAY SALES IT DOESN'T DO VERY WELL AND I WOULD NEVER USE IT FOR A BIG FUNCTION SLOW AND NOT A VERY GOOD ZOOM JUST A OK CAMERA I PAID $88 SO NOT TOO BAD ON PRICE AND IT'S WIRELESS UPLOADS NICELY BE SURE TO DISABLE FIREWALL OR YOU'LL NEVER GET IT TO WORK IT DOESN'T WORK ON  5G WIRELESS NOT THAT BIG OF DEAL

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made camera
Reviews.Author: Anthony C Lombardi
Reviews.Content: Used it for three months and I received average photos. Opened up case after storing in Amazon purchased case just for camera and found lens covers had become jamb. When on switch is pressed only one side lens opens then with me help, I slide the other open. Neither close when camera is turned off.Would not buy this style - very fragile camera.

Reviews.Title: Expected better
Reviews.Author: A Schwartz
Reviews.Content: I Expected better quality, I was surprised when I received this, it's so low-quality, I don't recommend to Buy this.

Reviews.Title: Extremely poor quality photos. Do not buy this camera.  Big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Fashioneer
Reviews.Content: Poor picture quality.Every picture is blurry and grainy.The color quality was poor under everything but natural lighting.Low light pictures were terrible.The auto focus was slowMy 10 year old Sony 5mp was far better in every way.The only good thing I can say was it was light and fits in your pocket easily

Reviews.Title: Takes Pictures.
Reviews.Author: Kendall Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a camera, which takes pictures. And it does a decent job of it. It also fits in  your pocket. So if you're looking for a camera that takes pictures and fits in your pocket, you might consider this one. Because it works.

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Artcindy
Reviews.Content: This camera did not have a lot of features and was hard to work with. Thankfully Amazon took it back after I had the chance to try it out.

Reviews.Title: Right out of the box, it's a PITA! UPDATE after one disa=strous weekend
Reviews.Author: Jay Wimer "Jaybawb"
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom...OK, I have not shot the first photo yet, and I;m already totally turned off by this miniature monster.First off, a couple of good AA batteries were good enough for the last little canon i bought. THIS baby has to have a proprietary battery and a proprietary charger. It's not about the consumer, folks, it's about the "after-market". So, if I'm really serious about back-country traveling, i''l have to shell out more bucks for another battery, AND there is one more thing to remember to take along - the charger.Then there is the flimsy little strap that has to be threaded through an impossibly small hole to be attached.Miniaturization has reached its limits. The thing is just too DANGED SMALL.  So, I'm sitting here,  wait for the $%^#@ battery to charge.When/if I get a chance to actually take a picture, I'll update this review.UPDATE 5-20-2014There is one "little" problem. After charging two new batteries, I put one in the camera, turned it on and got the message "charge the battery". Put it back in the charger, got the green light, tried again, same problem.Finally noticed that there is just a slight amount of 'play' when the battery is resting against the red battery lock, so i stuck a small piece of paper over the battery to wedge it tight in the case. VOILA! It works. I  had the  same problem with the original battery that came with the camera, so there is no telling if it's a design flaw in the camera, or a design flaw in the batteries, but after missing  a LOT of photo mops over the past weekend, my attitude is "a pox on BOTH your houses, and I'm putting up this same review for the batteries.OH- And another thing: the batteries don't 'naturally" slide into the case. You have to work at it and it IS possible to get them in backwards.  This is beyond stupid.First photos were not too bad, and the videos, too. But I missed a lot of shots dues to the bogus 'dead battery" problem.

Reviews.Title: Software is full of malware
Reviews.Author: cynthia
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera.  Haven't used it yet so don't know the quality, ease of use, etc.  But I did install the software.  It is FULL of malware.  My computer slowed down considerably.  All of this crap started showing up.  Finally traced it back to a day last week when I installed the Canon software.  Took me an hour to remove it all.It REALLY colors my view of Canon. Why, Canon, do you want to taint your reputation and piss off your customers by doing this? Are you so desperate for revenue that you have to sell out to these malware losers?I am FURIOUS with you!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Average Camera
Reviews.Author: Jizzy Gillesspyy
Reviews.Content: Bought this little bad boy here with nothing but good thoughts in mind, that is until I received it in a smashed up package.  No harm done though, figured it was the damn pothead UPS guys smashing up my packages as usual.  I had great confidence in how this little guy was going to perform, that was until I tried shooting my first porno flick with it.  On the mini LCD located on the camera, the picture looked great, but once I plugged it into my TV everything was fuzzy and dark.  It also made the women in my shoot look like they added on 15 pounds and made them look 3 shades darker than they really were.  I was not very impressed with this camera.  I am just an up start business man in a field that requires HD now days and frankly, this little guy just doesn't cut the gravy.

Reviews.Title: Hate it!
Reviews.Author: Mom in SD
Reviews.Content: We had a Canon Elph for two years, and after dropping it a ton of times, it finally broke. I did a lot of research and bought this camera, and I am soooo disappointed. Our old Elph took beautiful crisp pictures. The quality was seriously amazing. I feel like every picture that I take with this camera comes out blurry. I wish I could return it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: E. A. Veronda
Reviews.Content: A bought this camera based on the reviews and a recommendation from a photographer who bought one for his wife. I sent it back.The camera being so compact is difficult to keep steady. only one out of three pictures came out clear the rest were distorted. I don't know if I just happen to get a lemon or what... I'm just really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: RDL926
Reviews.Content: I opened the box, charged the battery and then realized Canon doesn't include a memory card. When I finally was able to use this I found it was very nice. LCD is nice and large.  Pictures are also nice. As a replacement for an old and broken camera, this is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: No memory card? Really?!?
Reviews.Author: AF "nyc male"
Reviews.Content: So I received my phone, thinking it will work out of the box... only to discover that it requires a memory card... which is NOT included.  Why sell a camera that requires a memory card and not include it?!?  I'd give this a zero star if I could.

Reviews.Title: beware! memory card not included.
Reviews.Author: L. Krause
Reviews.Content: You need a memory card for the camera to work. they did not tell me that, so I can't really rate the camera yet.

Reviews.Title: I'm Sure This is a Fine Instrument, But it Rubbed Me the Wrong Way.
Reviews.Author: Legal Guardian
Reviews.Content: If, after an exhaustive search, this camera is your choice, then you should buy it.  After all, I have had friends marry individuals who I thought were wrong, in myriad ways, yet the marriage went well.  In like manner, I simply didn't like the looks of this thing, the cut of its jib, so I sent it back without even removing it from the box.  Perhaps I should be reviled for such shallow behavior, but I was caught in an emotional "blink" - a tipping point, a behavioral quick of nature, which might be traced back to one of my ancestor's reaction to a dinosaur.  For one thing, I didn't want to hold this queer little thing at a 90-degree angle in order to use it.  It made me feel awkward and off balance.  Since it is called a "canon," wouldn't a canon be placed squarely on the ground in order to be useful?  Who would fire off a canon with it lying on its side?  The lens, too, was positioned to one side, like some monstrous fetus, whose aberrational growth had produced a single, gargantuan eye, the unviable mass forever preserved in a jar of formaldehyde.  I couldn't bear to touch it.  I wanted symmetry, normalcy, and proportionality.  However, if such a curious thing is to your delight, then please do not be influenced by my derogative comments.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Debus
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a Birthday gift. Not yet given or used. Undetermined rating at this point the rating request is premature.
